alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, east central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swansboro, or 8 miles southeast of Piney Green, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Silverdale, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue, Hammocks Beach, Bogue Inlet Pier, Hammocks Beach State Park, Cedar Point and Indian Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
